text: 14.41 The testing of the following scenarios will be required as part of the planning application: z baseline (i.e. the situation at the time of submission); z the proposed development without mitigation/landscaping; z the proposed development with surrounding cumulative developments without mitigation/landscaping; z the proposed development with the inclusion of mitigation/ landscaping; and z the proposed development with surrounding cumulative developments with the inclusion of mitigation/landscaping. 14.42 Specific details on the required mitigation measures must be provided, including where and how these measures will be implemented. It must be ensured that all mitigation measures and landscaping proposed and tested in the wind microclimate assessment are proposed within the relevant planning documents, including the landscaping strategy.
